column1: Téra is a city in the Tillabéri Region
column2: Tera Department of Niger.  It is situated 175 km north-west of the capital Niamey
column3: close to the border with Burkina Faso.  It is mainly inhabited by Songhai
column5: Gourmantche and Buzu ethnic groups.  The majority of the population are farmers.

column1: Every Thursday marks the market day at Tera.  Animals
column4: sheep and domestic birds are traded by farmers from all corners of the Department.
